Title: Relates to the time election day workers must be at poll sites to prepare for the opening of polls
Summary: Relates to the time election day workers must be at poll sites to prepare for the opening of polls; one hour instead of one-half hour.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to the time election day workers must be at poll sites to prepare for the opening of polls, including receiving voting system keys and other ancillary election day supplies
